bdglue2.encoder

Class AvroEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdglue2.encoder.AvroEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BDGlueEncoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvroGenericRecordEncoder

    public class AvroEncoder
extends Object
implements BDGlueEncoder
    Encodes the data as an Avro record before sending it downstream for publishing.
